# es-illustration-harddrive



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

Displays Harddrive illustration.

## Usage

### Example

```tsx
export default () => <es-illustration-harddrive />;
```

```css
:host {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    align-content: center;
}
```

| Part             | Description                       |
| ---------------- | --------------------------------- |
| `"illustration"` | The root svg of the illustration. |
